text: Perttu Hynönen (born September 16, 1994) is a Finnish ice hockey defenceman. He is currently playing with Peliitat Heinola in the Finnish Mestis. Hynönen made his Liiga debut playing with Lahti Pelicans during the 2014–15 Liiga season. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish ice hockey defencemen Category:HIFK (ice hockey) players Category:Lahti Pelicans players
title: Perttu Hynonen
